message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more in the range of $140. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think $135 is a fair price for this product. It's a good compromise, don't you think?
I'm trying to be reasonable, but I think $130 is the highest I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
